entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
